value.description: In the year since George Floyd’s murder, across the country and within the halls of the Colorado State Capitol, lawmakers have been looking for ways to add more accountability for law enforcement agencies.

value.name: Sault man nabbed for bank robberies
value.description: A Sault Ste. Marie man allegedly took part in four bank robberies in Toronto in April. Financial institutions in East York and downtown were targeted between April 19 and 22, Toronto Police Service says.

value.description: A pit bull that attacked and severely injured a two-year-old boy in Lyndonville had previously attacked a town official and bitten another child.

value.description: An arrest warrant has been issued for the boyfriend of a missing, pregnant Pennsylvania mom who was found dead in South Philadelphia, according to the Philadelphia District Attorney's Office.
